A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Here's what I liked most about this movie: originality.  The unexpected.  The fake outs.  The misdirection.  The director did it in Looper and carried that through to this movie.  There was no death star to destroy.  It managed to be both respectful and irreverent of the original characters\, and the new.  Adam Driver gave an intense performance\, likely best of the cast.  Here's what I didn't like: Kylo's foil (General Hux) is just a punching bag.  Hard to take evil seriously when it's that incompetent.
